ondisc 0.0.5
  • Function reference

Reference

Initialize

Initialize an ondisc matrix from an mtx file (or list of mtx files), h5 file (or list of h5 files), or an in-memory R matrix.

create_ondisc_matrix_from_mtx()

Create an ondisc_matrix from a single .mtx file or a list of .mtx files.

create_ondisc_matrix_from_h5_list()

Create ondisc_matrix from a single .h5 file or a list of .h5 files.

create_ondisc_matrix_from_R_matrix()

Create an ondisc matrix from an R matrix.

Subset

Subset an ondisc matrix.

`[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) `[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Subset using the [ operator.

Pull submatrix into memory

Pull an arbitrary submatrix of an ondisc_matrix into memory.

`[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>) `[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>) `[[`(<ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<ANY>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<missing>) `[[`(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>,<missing>,<missing>) `[[`(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Pull a submatrix into memory using the [[ operator.

Getters

Get cell barcodes, feature names, feature IDs, cell covariate matrices, feature covariate matrices, and other data.

get_feature_ids() get_feature_names() get_cell_barcodes()

Get cell barcodes, feature names, and feature IDs.

get_cell_covariates() get_feature_covariates()

Get covariate matrices.

dim(<ondisc_matrix>) dim(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>) dim(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>) ncol() nrow()

Get dimension.

head(<ondisc_matrix>) head(<covariate_ondisc_matrix>) head(<multimodal_ondisc_matrix>)

Print first few rows and columns.

get_modality()

Get modality

get_ondisc_matrix()

Get the ondisc_matrix stored in a covariate_ondisc_matrix.

Mutate functions

Mutate the cell- or feature-specific covariate matrix.

mutate_cell_covariates() mutate_feature_covariates()

Mutate covariate matrices.

Read and write

Read and write ondisc matrix objects

save_odm() read_odm()

Save or read an ondisc_matrix

Classes

The three classes provided by the package are ondisc_matrix, covariate_ondisc_matrix, and multimodal_ondisc_matrix

ondisc_matrix() ondisc_matrix()

ondisc_matrix class

covariate_ondisc_matrix() covariate_ondisc_matrix()

covariate_ondisc_matrix class

multimodal_ondisc_matrix() multimodal_ondisc_matrix()

multimodal_ondisc_matrix class
